name: Was that real ?
description:
Use cameras to  escape from the monster, but be careful : some cameras are infected.

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

Monsters try to hunt you. You can see where they are with the cameras but the monsters can infect them. Infected cameras not only show the real world, but they also show monsters who doesn't exist !

You can differentiate the infected cameras from the "healthy" cameras with their color (red for infected and green for healthy).

You can play this game with mouse & keyboard or with a controller (only tested with ps4 controller)

Controls : 

- WASD, arrows or left joystick to move

- Q & R, scrollwheel or L1 and R1 to switch between the cameras (and go from the player's view to the cameras)

- Escape or circle to go back to the player's view

You can play fullscreen by clicking the blue button in the right bottom corner.

I will probably add windows and mac versions later .
